title: A Matter of choice
creator_credit: Keith Hounslow, Valentine Stewart and Crawford Productions
brief_description: The Colleges of Advanced Education both in the metropolitan area and the country offer alternative career training to the Universities as well as their role in technological training with which the public is already familiar. The colleges train students for careers in business and advertising, paramedical and other fields. From a treatment by Jim Harris.
